hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

content.text: Values are our innermost desires. The things are really important for us - no matter what. In this exercise you will practice making your personal values explicit, so that you can let them guide you in your everyday life.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

What was your experience reflecting upon your values like this?

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

content.heading: What was your experience reflecting upon your values like this?

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.heading: What was your experience reflecting upon your values like this?

hostNotes.text:
Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Well done. 

Now, you’ve calibrated your personal compass. 

Is there something you want to change in life after doing this? Do any of your chosen words or phrases need more attention from you? Plan one behavior you can do right now in line with your value.

en.name: PsyPal My values

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

en.description: Our inner values is about who we want to be in life. Living a value-based life is often more fulfilling and meaningful to people.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

content.text: Os valores representam os nossos desejos mais profundos. São aquilo que realmente tem importância para nós, independentemente das circunstâncias. Neste exercício, irá praticar a explicitação dos seus valores pessoais, para que os possa deixar guiá-lo no seu dia a dia.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

content.heading: Qual foi a sua experiência ao refletir sobre os seus valores desta forma?

hostNotes.text:

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Muito bem.

Acabou de ajustar o seu referêncial de valores pessoais.

Há algo que sinta que quer alterar na sua vida após esta reflexão? Alguma das palavras ou frases que escolheu necessita de uma atenção mais cuidadosa da sua parte? Planeie algo que possa pôr em prática de imediato, que esteja também alinhado com os seus valores.

pt-PT.name: Os meus valores

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

pt-PT.description: Os nossos valores dizem respeito a quem desejamos ser na vida. Viver uma vida baseada em valores é frequentemente mais gratificante e tem mais significado para as pessoas.

content.text: Værdier er vores inderste ønsker, som indebærer de ting, der er vigtige for os - uanset hvad. I denne øvelse vil du øve dig i at formulere dine personlige værdier, så du bedre kan lade dem guide dig i din hverdag.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

content.heading: Hvordan føltes det at reflektere over dine værdier på denne måde?

hostNotes.text:
Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

What was your experience reflecting upon your values like this?

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Godt klaret. 

Nu har du indstillet dit personlige kompas.

Er der noget, som du ønsker at ændre i dit liv efter at have gjort dette? Er der nogen af dine valgte ord eller sætninger, der kræver mere opmærksomhed fra dig? Planlæg én handling, som du kan udføre lige nu, i overensstemmelse med din værdi.

da.name: Mine værdier

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

da.description: Vores indre værdier omhandler, hvem vi ønsker at være her i tilværelsen. Det er ofte mere tilfredsstillende og meningsfuldt for folk at leve i overensstemmelse med deres værdier.

content.text: Hodnoty jsou naše nejniternější touhy. Věci, které jsou pro nás opravdu důležité - za všech okolností. V tomto cvičení si procvičíte vyjádřování vašich osobních hodnot, aby mohly vést váš každodenní život.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

content.heading: Jaká byla vaše zkušenost s tímto zamyšlením nad vašimi hodnotami?

hostNotes.text:
Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

What was your experience reflecting upon your values like this?

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

content.text:
Výborně.

Nyní jste zkalibrovali svůj osobní kompas.

Je něco, co po tomto cvičení chcete v životě změnit? Vyžadují některá z vámi vybraných slov nebo frází více pozornosti? Naplánujte si něco, co můžete souladu s vaší hodnotou udělat hned teď.

cs.name: Moje hodnoty

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

cs.description: Naše vnitřní hodnoty jsou o tom, kým chceme být v životě. Život založený na hodnotách je pro lidi často naplňující a smysluplnější.

hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

content.text: Waarden zijn onze diepste verlangens. De dingen die echt belangrijk voor ons zijn - hoe dan ook. In deze oefening ga je je persoonlijke waarden expliciet maken, zodat ze als gids kunnen dienen in jouw dagelijks leven.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

content.heading: Hoe heb je het ervaren om op deze manier over je waarden na te denken?

hostNotes.text:
Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

What was your experience reflecting upon your values like this?

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

content.heading: Hoe heb je het ervaren om op deze manier over je waarden na te denken?

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Goed gedaan.

Je hebt nu je persoonlijke kompas gekalibreerd.

Is er iets dat je in je leven wilt veranderen na deze oefening? Zijn er gekozen woorden of zinnen die meer aandacht van je nodig hebben? Plan één actie dat je nu meteen kunt doen in lijn met je waarde.

nl.name: Mijn waarden

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

nl.description: Onze innerlijke waarden gaan over wie we willen zijn in het leven. Een waardengedreven leven leiden is vaak meer vervullend en betekenisvol voor mensen.

pt-BR.description: Nossos valores internos dizem respeito a quem queremos ser na vida. Viver de acordo com nossos valores costuma tornar a vida mais satisfatória e significativa para as pessoas.

hostNotes.text: >Comece a sessão quando estiver pronto para seguir

pt-BR.name: PsyPal Meus valores

hostNotes.text:
Bem-vindos. Eu sou X e hoje vamos trabalhar por cerca de 30 minutos em xx.

Faremos xx, por exemplo, uma meditação, seguida de um tempo para reflexão e compartilhamento entre nós.

Vamos começar com um mini check-in. Como você está se sentindo agora? Por favor, responda em duas ou três palavras. X, você gostaria de começar?

> Deixe todos na sessão, inclusive você, fazerem o check-in um por um.

Obrigado a todos por compartilharem. Vamos começar.

content.text: Valores são nossos desejos mais profundos — aquilo que realmente importa para nós, independentemente das circunstâncias. Neste exercício, você irá praticar tornar seus valores pessoais explícitos, para que possa deixá-los guiar suas escolhas no dia a dia.

hostNotes.text:
Encontre uma posição confortável. Vou iniciar o exercício em áudio e nos encontraremos aqui novamente depois.

> Aperte play para começar o exercício em áudio.

content.heading: Como foi sua experiência ao refletir sobre seus valores dessa forma?

hostNotes.text:
Agora vamos tirar 1 minuto para refletir individualmente.

Como foi para você a experiência de refletir sobre seus valores dessa forma?

Você pode fazer anotações em um papel ou apenas mentalmente. Não existe certo ou errado aqui, nossas respostas são pessoais. 1 minuto começando agora.

> Aperte play para iniciar o cronômetro.

Passou 1 minuto, é hora de seguir em frente.

content.heading: Como foi sua experiência ao refletir sobre seus valores dessa forma?

hostNotes.text:
Agora estamos entrando na parte de compartilhamento. Temos três regras para o compartilhamento:

1. **O que é dito aqui, fica aqui.**
2. **Tudo o que você precisa fazer é ouvir.** Não é necessário consertar, ajudar ou dar conselhos. Estamos apenas presentes e explorando o que nós e os outros estamos vivenciando.

3. **Tudo o que você sentir é válido.** Raiva, amor, ódio, tristeza. O que surgir. Não existe certo ou errado. 

O cronômetro será ajustado para 2 minutos como referência. Se você não quiser compartilhar, pode simplesmente dizer “passo”.

Quem gostaria de começar?

> Deixe todos (ou o maior número possível, conforme o tempo permitir) compartilharem um por um. Aperte play para iniciar o cronômetro. Reinicie para cada novo compartilhamento.

Muito obrigado a todos.

Muito bem. Se quiser, você pode continuar o que começamos aqui hoje com uma sugestão para trazer isso para o seu dia a dia.

xx descrição da sugestão

Antes de sairmos deste espaço, vamos fazer um mini check-out.

Como você está se sentindo agora? Algo mudou? Por favor, responda em duas ou três palavras.

Quem gostaria de começar?

> Deixe todos (ou o maior número possível, conforme o tempo permitir) compartilharem um por um. Aperte play para iniciar o cronômetro. Reinicie para cada novo compartilhamento.

Muito obrigado a todos.

content.text:
Muito bem.

Agora você calibrou sua bússola pessoal.

Há algo que você queira mudar na vida depois de fazer este exercício? Alguma das palavras ou frases que você escolheu precisa de mais atenção? Planeje um comportamento que você possa colocar em prática agora, alinhado ao seu valor.
